QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT DISTINCT patid, yrdob, gdr_cd, state, eligeff, eligend, CASE WHEN eligeff < '10/01/2005' THEN '10/01/2005' ELSE eligeff END as startDate, COALESCE(bus,'') + ' ' bus, CASE WHEN ASO = 'Y' THEN '(ASO) ' else '' END as aso, CASE WHEN PRODUCT = 'HMO' THEN 'Health Maint Org' WHEN PRODUCT = 'PPO' THEN 'Preferred Provider Org' WHEN PRODUCT = 'EPO' THEN 'Exclusive Provider Org' WHEN PRODUCT = 'IND' THEN 'Indemnity' WHEN PRODUCT = 'POS' THEN 'Point of Service' WHEN PRODUCT = 'ALL' THEN 'National Ancillaries, All Products' WHEN PRODUCT = 'UNK' THEN 'Unknown' WHEN PRODUCT = 'OTH' THEN 'Other' ELSE COALESCE(PRODUCT,'') END AS product, CASE WHEN CDHP = 1 THEN '(HRA)' WHEN CDHP = 2 THEN '(HSA)' ELSE '' END as cdhp, PAT_PLANID FROM Member_Detail JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID )
select *, LTRIM(bus) + LTRIM(aso) + LTRIM(product) + LTRIM(cdhp) as PayerSource from a
